Rheophysics of Soft Matter group

Welcome to the Rheophysics of Soft Matter group at UCAS International Soft Matter Center and Wenzhou Institute!

   

What’s New

  • 2024.2 Our work on a ridge instability was published in Physics of Fluids and featured in Editors’ Picks.
  • 2023.10 Our lab got ARES-G2 (rheometor)
  • 2023.5 - Our paper about colloidal gelation with non-sticky particles is out in Nature Communications. Featured in Editors’ Highlights
  • 2022.10 - Our odd viscosity paper is out now on Frontiers in Physics.
  • 2022.3 - Review paper `The physics of dense suspensions’ was published in Annual Review of Condensed Matter Physics
  • 2022.1 Dynamic Zero-COVID Strategy in China, Kagaku (Iwanami Shoten, Publishers)
  • 2021.12 New paper with Zhiyuan (open access)
  • 2021.9 New paper on shear jamming fluid model was published in Phys. Rev. Lett.
